1.title: Go Fish
1.plot: The bears are attacked by a giant goldfish during their fishing trip.

2.title: Teacher's Pet
2.plot: The bears escape their lives on the street by attending a school.

3.title: Googs
3.plot: The bears win a chance to visit Googs headquarters, but it's not what it seems.

4.title: Paperboyz
4.plot: The baby bears looking for money get a job as paperboys.

5.title: Bear Squad
5.plot: The bears are robbed and Ranger Tabes deputizes them to catch the thief.

6.title: Lil' Squid
6.plot: The baby bears rescue a baby squid from being eaten and embark on a quest to find its family.

7.title: I, Butler
7.plot: The bears build a robot butler to help with their cleaning, but things go awry.

8.title: Family Troubles
8.plot: Things change for Grizz, the star of his own sitcom, when a new, cooler cast member gets added to the show.

9.title: Best Bears
9.plot: The bears get ready for Darrell's wedding.

10.title: Crowbar Jones: Origins
10.plot: Grizz pitches his Crowbar Jones movie to Nom Nom, hoping that he will join the film.

11.title: Hot Sauce
11.plot: The bears have run out of their favorite hot sauce, their desperation leads them to a fake knockoff hot sauce, and they are arrested.

12.title: Mom App
12.plot: The Bears try to find a surrogate mom.

13.title: The Limo
13.plot: Charlie meets a creature just like him named Ralph.

14.title: More Everyone's Tube
14.plot: Through another video browsing session online, we get more videos uploaded by the Bears and their friends.

27.title: The Mall
27.plot: The Bears go the mall and encounter their human counterparts.

28.title: Tunnels

0.title: Pilot
0.plot: The Bears crash a child's birthday party in hopes of making friends and blending in with society.

1.title: Our Stuff
1.plot: After a game of basketball the Bears find out their stuff has been stolen.

2.title: Viral Video
2.plot: In Grizzly's desperate attempt to acquire more friends, the brothers attend Meme Con to become "internet famous".

3.title: Food Truck
3.plot: Disappointed with the dishes served by local food trucks, the bears open their own food truck.

4.title: Chloe
4.plot: The bears become friends with an intelligent girl who has chosen them for her college report.

5.title: Panda's Date
5.plot: After accidentally consuming a food that he is allergic to, Panda is saved by a cashier whom he develops a strong crush on.

6.title: Everyday Bears
6.plot: As the bears start their day with their usual routine, they individually get caught into sticky situations; Grizz gets stuck in a tree, a mouse lands on Panda's computer and Ice Bear's new Roomba malfunctions.

7.title: Burrito
7.plot: While visiting a burrito place, Grizz becomes obsessed with a bear-sized burrito that eventually becomes his whole life.

8.title: Primal
8.plot: Grizz gets the bears lost in the deep forest to test whether or not they have lost their survival instincts in the modern world.

9.title: Jean Jacket
9.plot: The bears find a jacket that supposedly brings them good luck whenever they wear it.

10.title: Nom Nom
10.plot: After a recent meltdown, a bedraggled Nom Nom asks the bears to help him regain his spot as "cutest Internet star."

11.title: Shush Ninjas
11.plot: Tired of the decay of etiquette in movie theaters, the bears decide to shush people who ruin movies for others.

12.title: My Clique
12.plot: Chloe has a hard time making new friends in college, so the Bears give her to some help.

13.title: Charlie
13.plot: The bears meet an annoying friend.

14.title: Brother Up
14.plot: Panda scares away a pack of wolves, disrupting the hierarchy of the bears and making him the leader.

15.title: Occupy Bears
15.plot: The Bears' home is threatened by a construction project and they must prove they own their place. They go through memories and records to try and save their home.

16.title: Panda's Sneeze
16.plot: Panda's accident sneeze video goes viral on the internet.

17.title: The Road
17.plot: In a trip to the past, the young bears struggle to find a home on the open road.

18.title: Emergency
18.plot: Panda and Grizzly bring a crab as a pet and it bites Ice Bear. It's a race against time to take Ice Bear to the hospital.

19.title: Tote Life
19.plot: While at the grocery store the Bears buy reusable bags called totes. Then it becomes their life!

20.title: Charlie & the Snake
20.plot: When Charlie decided to bring the three bears on a party and try to get them food, he accidentally met a snake where they became friends and escape from photographers.

21.title: Video Date
21.plot: When Panda start dating a french girl, Celine by video dating, his brothers agrees to help him but then each of them falls in love with Celine, as they try to impress Celine all at once.

22.title: Pet Shop
22.plot: The story goes back when the three bears were still little cubs as they try to get adopted.

23.title: Chloe & Ice Bear
23.plot: When Chloe decided to spend the day with the three bears and found out that only Ice Bear is available, they went on sightseeing as Chloe try to have fun with Ice Bear, later ending up in the National Museum.

24.title: Cupcake Job
24.plot: After busting their laptop, the bears attempt to make the money needed to repair it by getting a job at a cupcake shop.

25.title: Hibernation
25.plot: After Grizz reads a book about hibernation, he tries to hibernate while his brothers don't want him to.

26.title: Charlie Ball
26.plot: Panda gets hurt playing basketball so the Bears invite Charlie join the team. Unexpectedly, Charlie gets good fast. Too good.

1.title: Yard Sale
1.plot: A box full of free stuff the bears find at a yard sale send each of them on their own adventure.

2.title: Slumber Party
2.plot: A thunderstorm moves in and forces Chloe to spend the night with the bears.

3.title: Bear Cleanse
3.plot: The Bears go to their doctor for a check-up and are told that they eat too much human food. Their physician prescribes a more natural 'bear-based' eating plan. They are enthused at first, but eventually struggle with the rigors of dieting.

4.title: Nom Nom's Entourage
4.plot: Andy Bangs is the hottest new online celebrity. Feeling the heat from his competition, Nom Nom realizes he needs cooler friends and enlists the Bears as his entourage.

5.title: Ranger Tabes
5.plot: When the 3 bears package disappears- they receive help from the local lady-ranger.

7.title: Losing Ice
7.plot: Feeling unappreciated, Ice Bear leaves the family and gets a job at an Asian restaurant.

8.title: Cellie
8.plot: After Panda is mad at his brothers for using his phone too much, Grizz and Ice Bear decide to get their own phone which are better than the one Panda has and he get jealous.

9.title: Fashion Bears
9.plot: The bears starts wearing clothes. They start to participate in everyone's daily life. Panda finds himself a fiancee, Grizzly- a job and Ice Bear becomes a fashion model.

10.title: The Island
10.plot: The baby bears got isolated on an island with a lovely "couple".

11.title: Bear Flu
11.plot: After the bears swim in a lake- they catch a flu. Chloe tries to take care of them, but things got out of hand when the authorities get involved.

12.title: Chicken and Waffles
12.plot: Bear Flu: The Bears become terribly ill and Chloe takes it upon herself to take care of them. But things get tricky when word of the Bears' sickness goes viral. / Chicken and Waffles: Panda needs to meet his brothers at the most exclusive restaurant in town. But when he loses his contacts lenses and can't see, Panda needs Charlie's help to get him into the city.

13.title: The Audition
13.plot: The Audition: The Bears audition to be the next mascot for their favorite cereal. They get so caught up in the process that their competitiveness gets the best of them.

14.title: Captain Craboo
14.plot: The Bears are reunited with their pet crab, Captain Craboo. But after an unfortunate run-in with Nom Nom, the Bears may lose their pet forever.

15.title: Baby Bears on a Plane
15.plot: The "adventures" of the 3 brother bears (as cubs) on board of an airplane.

16.title: Yuri and the Bear
16.plot: Yuri and the Bear: Baby Ice Bear lives alone in the arctic and meets a mysterious man named Yuri. Together they help each other survive the cold environment.

17.title: Icy Nights
17.plot: Ice Bear's custom vacuum mobile gets stolen by a gang of techies, and he must navigate the city's underground world in order to retrieve it.

18.title: Everyone's Tube
18.plot: Icy Nights: Ice Bear rides his custom vacuum into the city. But when a gang of techies steal the vacuum, Ice Bear goes on a rescue mission that takes him through the underground world of the city. / Everyone's Tube: Through a standard video browsing session online, we get a glimpse of the different kinds of videos the Bears have posted.

19.title: Creature Mysteries
19.plot: Ranger Tabes tells the Bears she's been investigating a mysterious creature. But when the Bears realize she's actually investigating their friend Charlie, they split up to ensure Charlie's safety.

20.title: The Library
20.plot: The bears try and help Chloe study for a big test, but end up ruining the library's peace and quiet in the process.

21.title: Grizz Helps
21.plot: Being bored and suffering lack of attention from his brothers, Grizz tries to find for himself a new entertainment as a vigilante for those who don't really need his help.

22.title: Christmas Parties
22.plot: The bears get invitations from Ranger Tabes, Charlie, and Chloe for 3 separate Christmas parties, but the the bears get an invitation from Nom-Nom, so now, the bears must equally divide their time at each party in order to get to Nom-Nom's party.

23.title: Subway
23.plot: The Bears are stranded on a subway platform after missing their train. But while waiting, the Bears are challenged with recovering some lost items.

24.title: Panda's Friend
24.plot: After Grizz and Ice Bear try to get Panda a new friend, Panda finds an app that finds friends. Then, Panda makes a new friend named Tom, and they both have a lot in common.

25.title: Neighbors
25.plot: New neighbors arrive and set up their camp near the bears' cave. This is super exciting to Panda and Ice Bear, but Grizzly is suspicious.

1.title: Grizzly the Movie
1.plot: Grizzly lands a role in a film about grizzly bears, but it turns out to be a different sort of movie than he expected.

2.title: Anger Management
2.plot: Nom Nom wants to go on a famous children's show, but has to complete an anger management class. Grizz goes along.

3.plot: The Baby Bears' dreams come true when they find a 100-dollar bill. But when they can't bear to spend it, they realize it's difficult to let go.

4.title: Professor Lampwick
4.plot: Chloe's professor is too mean to give her any face time to talk over her poor grade. The Bears take things into their own hands to help, causing big trouble for Chloe.

5.title: Ralph
5.plot: The bears' friend Charlie meets a another creature just like himself, Ralph. But Grizzly, Panda, and Ice Bear are not fans of the new guy.

6.title: Planet Bears
6.plot: Set like the BBC documentary Planet Earth, the omniscient narrator covers the bears' morning and trip to the grocery store.

7.title: Coffee Cave
7.plot: When the bears learn that Ice Bear makes great coffee, they start a coffee shop. But when they get too many customers, things get difficult.

8.title: Charlie's Big Foot
8.plot: After Charlie hurts his foot, The Bears have to sneak him into a hospital for medical assistance.

9.title: The Demon
9.plot: When playing with a potato gun, Chloe and Ice Bear lose Chloe's special hoodie. To get it back they have to go through a highly aggressive canine named "The Demon"

10.title: Panda's Art
10.plot: Panda uses Charlie as a model for his new painting, which he then gifts to Charlie. But then it turns bad when Panda is offered money for the painting after he gifted it to Charlie.

11.title: Poppy Rangers
11.plot: Ranger Tabes leads a troop of young girls into a cave expedition, and brings Grizz as their cave expert.

12.title: Lucy's Brother
12.plot: To impress Lucy, Panda offers to babysit her brother, Clifford. But Clifford turns out to be too high maintenance for Panda to handle.

13.title: The Fair
13.plot: The baby bears become prizes in a carnival, so they can be won and therefore adopted. But because the bears are generating publicity, the owner will do anything to make them stay.

14.title: Private Lake
14.plot: When the bears want to go to their local lake, they find it overcrowded and dirty. Because of this they go to Charlie's personal and pristine lake. After having a great time, the bears accidentally post their experiences to social media.

15.title: Lunch with Tabes
15.plot: The bears have lunch with Ranger Tabes, but when Tabes's sandwich gets stolen, she gets into full detective mode to find the culprit.

16.title: Road Trip
16.plot: Chloe and the bears embark on a journey to see a meteor shower. Since Ice Bear is the only one who can drive he is appointed as "captain". Things get dicey when a hitchhiker joins the crew.

17.title: Summer Love
17.plot: Panda goes to great lengths to try to return a phone to the girl of his dreams.

18.title: The Kitty
18.plot: The bears find a cute kitty in the forest, and decide to keep it. But things go awry when adult cougars enter their home.

19.title: Crowbar Jones
19.plot: Grizz screens an epic amateur movie he just made for a focus group. But when he notices people are leaving he must figure out ways to keep the audience engaged.

20.title: Kyle
20.plot: Nom-Nom meets his long-lost brother, Kyle.

21.title: Citizen Tabes
21.plot: After accidentally wounding an animal, Rangers Tabes quits her job. The Bears do what they can to coax her out of retirement.

22.title: Dance Lessons
22.plot: When Panda and Lucy take part in a dance contest, Panda can't find the heart to tell her she's a bad dancer.

23.title: Icy Nights II
23.plot: Ice Bear makes a night trip to rescue Yana, and meets some foes from the past.

24.title: Dog Hotel
24.plot: With no place to stay while their cave gets fumigated, the Bears book a night at a hotel for dogs.

25.title: Bear Lift
25.plot: To help their friend Darrel save the mouse pad store, bears become Buddy driver to make money.

26.title: The Nom Nom Show
26.plot: Things go awry while Nom Nom shoots his TV show, so the bears offer to help and appear on his show.

27.title: Ice Cave
27.plot: Ralph takes over the cave and turns it into a snowy fortress where he reigns as king over the Bears and Charlie.

28.title: Spa Day
28.plot: While the bears are at the spa, Grizz enjoys everything it offers, Panda gets trapped in the steam room, and Ice Bear plays a game of ping pong.

29.title: Charlie's Halloween Thing
29.plot: Charlie hosts an evening of spooky stories starring the Bears.

30.title: Bunnies
30.plot: The baby bears find a group of bunnies who live in fear of crows, so they decide to help them.

31.title: Pigeons
31.plot: Grizz becomes best buds with a flock of pigeons.

32.title: Panda 2
32.plot: Baby Panda happily lives in a closed off environment for study. But when he's given a new friend, Panda 2, his worldview is shaken, which sets him off on a great adventure.

33.title: Tubin
33.plot: In search of some adventure, the Bears ride a tube down a dangerous river.

34.title: Lazer Royale
34.plot: The Baby Bears sign up for a game of laser tag, hoping to win some ice cream. But, the round of laser tag turns out to be less of a game and more like a war zone.

35.title: Ranger Games
35.plot: Grizz helps Ranger Tabes and the Poppy Rangers play a game of kickball against their rivals.

36.title: The Perfect Tree
36.plot: Chloe and Ice Bear drive up north to find the perfect Christmas tree. Meanwhile, Grizz and Panda are in charge of decorating Chloe's house.

37.title: Bearz II Men
37.plot: The Baby Bears help a teenager accomplish his dream of being a famous singer.

38.title: Bro Brawl
38.plot: The two pairs of brothers, Tom, Isaac, and Griff and the bear bros, get on a game show to see who are the best bros.

39.title: Hurricane Hal
39.plot: While a hurricane hits, the bears are sprawled across town. Grizz with the Poppy Rangers, Panda with Charlie, and Ice Bear with Chloe. They all try to make it through the storm.

40.title: Vacation
40.plot: Nom Nom is heavily stressed by his excessive popularity. Grizz comes with him on a vacation to lower his stress.

41.title: Beehive
41.plot: The Bears allow bees to live in the cave to make honey. But soon the Bears, entranced by the honey, become the bees' mindless servants.

42.title: The Park
42.plot: The Bears spend a day at the park. Grizz works out. Panda attempts to sell his artwork. Ice Bear trains some kids.

43.title: I Am Ice Bear
43.plot: After Ice Bear hits his head, Grizz and Panda notice him acting like a different person.

44.title: Baby Bears Can't Jump
44.plot: The baby bears play a game of basketball against a ragtag group of kids to win a pizza.

-1.title: Potty Time
-1.plot: The Baby Bears search for people to adopt them is disrupted by Panda's need to find a bathroom.

imdb.plot outline: Three brother bears awkwardly attempt to find their place in civilized society, whether they're looking for food, trying to make human friends, or scheming to become famous on the internet. Grizzly, Panda and Ice Bear stack atop one another when they leave their cave and explore the hipster environs of the San Francisco Bay Area, and it's clear the siblings have a lot to learn about a technologically driven world. By their side on many adventures are best friend Chloe (the only human character in the cast), fame-obsessed koala Nom Nom, and Charlie, aka Bigfoot.
imdb.title: We Bare Bears
plot: Three bear brothers do whatever they can to be a part of human society by doing what everyone around them does.::Benjamin Rothrock

Three brother bears awkwardly attempt to find their place in civilized society, whether they're looking for food, trying to make human friends, or scheming to become famous on the internet. Grizzly, Panda and Ice Bear stack atop one another when they leave their cave and explore the hipster environs of the San Francisco Bay Area, and it's clear the siblings have a lot to learn about a technologically driven world. By their side on many adventures are best friend Chloe (the only human character in the cast), fame-obsessed koala Nom Nom, and Charlie, aka Bigfoot.::Jwelch5742
